header: Full-Stack Software Engineer | ENSEK May 2019 - Present
responsibilities: Actively engaged with the client and Client Services to deliver high profile, new technological solutions for clients allowing them to integrate new processes to reduce drug wastage and introduce complex medication temperature tracking, in addition to delivering multiple complex projects.
Continued to support the Client Services team throughout all stages of project lifespan, including participating in client meetings and UAT (user acceptance testing).
Worked with both Solutions Designers and Project Managers to maintain a high quality and consistent approach to project design across multiple projects using similar, complex bespoke functionality.

Identified gaps in and led initiatives to eliminate the weaknesses from existing internal processes. Worked to roll out these initiatives, create supporting documentation and resources which continue to be used by Software Engineers within the department.
Constantly manage time-sensitive projects with changeable priorities and delivery dates in a proactive manner.

Maintained a positive and friendly attitude in difficult situations, including delivering difficult feedback to the Client Services team which would have consequences in client communications and relationships.
Developing and maintaining bespoke client websites from branding guidelines.
Creating and maintaining back-end solutions and integrating with AWS microservices.
Internationalisation of our clients’ websites to enable growth and expansion into the international market.
Responsible for adhering to SOLID principles, writing clean code and ensuring that these ideals are maintained across the code base through peer reviews.
Working with Product Owners and Business Analysts to size and refine work items to help facilitate confident commitments to sprints.
Assisting with deployments for UAT and addressing any issues found during testing.
